title: How to deal with nested levels of `Unis`
body:
I need to implement a `@ServerRequestFilter`, and it calls several levels of async calls, which generates nested  `Unis`, and here is the screenshot of the code:

![C94C3529-972F-4262-A54D-0AC505B5B0F0](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/3773928/148394629-8f32215d-e298-4645-97df-8ff0d5e905d0.png)

However this makes a problem that makes the return type has nested level of `Unis` :

![6684DDB2-5626-4A70-BA6B-39FB1E221783](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/3773928/148394663-d2235076-a31c-4cbf-a43e-bdbd064d73df.png)

And this breaks the convention of `@ServerRequestFilter`:

![D53D46A1-A28B-464A-B452-B0FB781BF0AA](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/3773928/148394685-6de99329-dd45-474b-b8b5-d0f09f83de09.png)

Is there any solution to my problem?
